name: Big_Log
text:
Big Log
The Big Log was a minor landmark in Twin Peaks, Washington, a giant cross-cut tree trunk permanently affixed to a flatcar.
In late 2016, the wedding ceremony of Ed Hurley and Norma Jennings was held in front of the log, where reportedly "half the town" turned out.
Behind the scenes
The shot of the log in the opening credits of the pilot episode was filmed at the Snoqualmie Centennial Log in Railroad Community Park. Since then, a protective fence has been built around the log itself.
